events.message: I want to request a refund for my recent order because the item did not arrive as expected and I am very disappointed.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on the customer's mention of refund and dissatisfaction.
Support agent Alice has been assigned to handle the refund request and will follow up shortly.
Hello, this is Alice from customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund, and I'm here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you are requesting a refund so I can process this for you?
The order number is 123456789, and I want a refund because the product arrived damaged and unusable, which is very frustrating.
Thank you for the information. I am processing your refund request now and you should receive the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for your quick response and handling my refund so efficiently. I appreciate your help.
The refund request has been completed successfully, and the customer has been notified that the amount will be credited shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund was received. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund in my account today. Thank you very much for your excellent support.
The support case has been closed following confirmation that the refund was successfully received and the customer is satisfied.
